location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Printed Map of Border Region of the British Protectorate of Aden

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 340mm x 255mmMaterials: 1 paper folio that has been lined with cloth support at a later date.

mods.abstract: A printed map of border region of the British protectorate of Aden. An accompaniment to letter No. 21 from the Aden Boundary Commission sent 15 March 1904.
